poem:
### Visionary

Grand declarations—
a fossil fog, promising  
emerald futures.
Seeds sown in carbon soil,
withdrawn at dawn
by broken faith,
a matchstick tower
crumbling.

Green dreams fade
into oily nights.

—like petals plucked  
and scattered in the wind.
